channel.title: Entertainment
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Entertainment, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: “The Bachelor”'s Caila Quinn Welcomes Baby No. 3 with Husband Nick Burrello
item.description: The couple first announced they were expecting a baby in July

item.title: 3-Year-Old Girl Will Hear Holiday Sounds for the First Time After Remarkable Surgery: 'It Just Means So Much' (Exclusive)
item.description: Lifestyle influencer Kennedy Chugg shares how her family chose a cochlear implant to help daughter Stella with her progressive hearing loss

item.title: Kevin Arkadie, “New York Undercover” Co-Creator, Dies at 68
item.description: Arkadie, who also worked on 'NYPD Blue' and 'The Shield,' launched 'New York Undercover' alongside Dick Wolf in 1994

item.title: Chuck Norris Mourns Ex-Wife and High School Sweetheart Dianne Holechek After Her Death at 84: 'Meant the World to Me'
item.description: Chuck Norris and his ex-wife Dianne Holechek shared sons Mike and Eric, who also work in Hollywood

item.title: “Miss Congeniality” Was Originally Meant to Be a Very Different Film, Director Reveals as Movie Turns 25 (Exclusive)
item.description: 25 years after the film was released, director Donald Petrie is looking back at the details that earned the film its place in action comedy history

item.title: Lions Fan Claims He Called DK Metcalf Full Name Before Punch, WR Reportedly Claims Slur
item.description: The Detroit Lions fan on the receiving end of a punch from Pittsburgh Steelers star DK Metcalf is speaking out ... insisting he simply called the play...

item.title: Nick Reiner Says He Threw Rock Through Window to Appear Insane in Resurfaced Interview
